Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth.BasicRealm.getPassword(String)
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth.LDAPRealm.getPassword(String)
    org.bluezoo.gumdrop.auth.Realm.getPassword(String)
    This method exposes plaintext passwords and should be avoided. Use Realm.passwordMatch(String, String) for simple authentication or Realm.getDigestHA1(String, String) for HTTP Digest Authentication.
